billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Authorizes an income tax deduction of monies deposited into a house, townhouse, condominium or unit in a cooperative housing corporation account
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a first time home buyer income tax deduction for monies deposited into a house, townhouse, condominium or unit in a cooperative housing corporation purchase account and providing for penalties for unauthorized withdrawals from such an account
